EditTextPreference.android:summary: The size of the Vario buffer display in measurements

EditTextPreference.android:summary: The rate at which measurements are taken in the vario buffer
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: The rate at which vario measurements are made from the pressure stream for display purposes. 3 means that 1 in 3 pressure readings are used as measurements in the vario data buffer. The time of the display in seconds is 'Buffer Size' / 50 x 'Buffer Rate'

EditTextPreference.android:summary: The increase in tone for each 1 m/s of vario
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: For each 1 m/s of lift the audio frequency will increase by this amount

EditTextPreference.android:summary: The value above which the audio begins beeping
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: Above this value in m/s the vario will begin beeping

EditTextPreference.android:title: Vario Audio Cutoff
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The value below which stops the vario beeping
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: If the vario is beeping it will stop below this value. Should be lower than Vario Audio Threshold.

EditTextPreference.android:summary: The decrese in sink tone for each -1 m/s
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: For each -1 m/s of sink the audio frequency will decrease by this amount

EditTextPreference.android:title: Sink Audio Threshold
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The value below which the sink tone plays
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: Below this value in m/s the sink tone will start playing

EditTextPreference.android:title: Sink Audio Cutoff
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The value above which the sink tone stops playing
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: Above this value in m/s the sink tone will stop playing. Should be higher than Sink Audio Cutoff
